summary: This test module verifies the behavior of the CGP Individual class, including genome creation, randomization, handling of parameters across multiple computational back‑ends (NumPy, pure Python, SymPy, PyTorch), serialization with pickle, conversion to and from PyTorch tensors, back‑propagation support, and correct fitness management when parameters are updated.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the CGP Individual implementation works correctly in evolutionary and machine‑learning contexts, ensuring compatibility with various numeric libraries, reliable persistence, and proper fitness handling during parameter updates.
